This game in it's current state is an absolute mess that is so sweaty and so difficult and so unfair feeling that you can't find fun in it anymore. But the game wasn't always like this. Back in the early days of Dead by daylight you had this foundation for the game and it was what made the game function and allowed you to find enjoyment out of it. Fast forward to now and it feels like they've had 20 different builders come in to add on to that original foundation and now its a jumbled mess of pieces that don't fit together. The amount of broken perks they've added and continue to add as band-aids to fundamental game issues has over time torn this game apart. The most recent ones they have added its become ghastly just how unfun they are to play against. Boon's are game breaking an over reliance on gen perks for killers which make playing survivor feel dreadful. Adding killers that either are to weak to be viable in the very difficult meta like the Trickster or killers with powers that end chases very fast like the Nemisis. Which ruins the survivors experience because chases are the fun part of the game. It tend's to also ruin the killers experience because to balance for the killers chase power they have awful map pressure which means gens are being done fast. In summary I would of recommended you play this game in 2017 or 2018 but now this game feels like it needs a total overhaul because of how over complicated messy and mashed together it feels.

Um bom jogo para aqueles que querem um pouco de adrenalina. Jogue como o killer e encarne os slashers preferidos dos filmes, perseguindo, batendo e até mesmo pondo no gancho aqueles que ousaram escapar de sua fúria. Jogue como sobrevivente e comece a orar, pois a única saída é o reparo dos geradores, onde a adrenalina e o medo se encontram. 

Pessoalmente, um ótimo jogo (mesmo não pegando 100% no meu not).
It's pretty grindy, but it is a fun experience that has been balanced pretty well compared to years ago

Pros:
Really the only game of this genre. Fun, interesting, not really a P2W game.

Cons: Had some horrible bugs that made me crash after every intro screen. Didn't find a solution to my problem so i had to wait till the next update (2 times). Horrible balancing issues and both sides abusing shitty tactics to win.

Overall i'd give it a 8.5/10.

As much as i used to love this game and have spent over 1000 hrs on it i cannot and will not recommend the game in its current state!

The devs care more about selling their new DLCs then they do about tackling the many hackers that currently reside in the game without any restriction or punishment, its only getting worse as the devs haven't installed any hacker protection in place and i personally see it becoming a security risk in the future for anyone who launches the game.

On top of that the game is full of unfixed bugs and a massive power in balance between the killers and survivors with the survivors having perks that can be considered very OP especially when stacked.

The Devs also ignore their own community regarding these issues and as a result many of the big youtube/twitch streamers have now moved onto other content a they too are getting tired of the hackers hijacking and holding them hostage in game ( many videos of this happening, look it up!!)

Maybe one day the Devs will wise up and FIX THE GAME or another  company takes over as it had so much potential to be great, but for now the game is broken and i do not recommend you get this game.

It's got a learning curve, but the game is really well designed. Killers are unique, polished and shows that thought has gone into their implementation. Like a lot of games with an old following, people grumble and "jokingly" talk about how to game is bad etc. As someone who started playing a few months ago, it's a ton of fun. I've put in a ton of hours and I'm not close to the fatigue those people have.

This is one of my favorite games. I hate it with my whole heart. Don't play it.

Actual helpful review: It's better with friends and has a heavy, heavy learning curve. Survivor is fun when you don't want to stress too much, killer is fun when you want a challenge. Personally think survivors could do with a basekit like killers have. Either way, love the game.

最后，大家听我说，我有个事儿要宣布，我爱黎明杀机，我是啥比！

Wouldnt recommend anyone get into this game. It is fun. But the game just has base issues not unlike evolve that just kills it. Killers hooking one person and standing in front of them the entire match not trying to win but just ruin one persons day. Survivors are just as toxic if not more and make killer downright un-fun when just starting out. If you can stomach 1/6 matches being a human cesspool then I suppose it can still be fun but....
The devs also dont give a flying fuck about the game so yeah. Took years to fix  keys still have not banned anyone for cheating or stretched res which is cheating. Then there was a whole ddosing fiasco. The devs dont really seem to listen to the community (unlike a game like hunt which actively implements community changes) all aside the game is fun the killers are fun the survivors are sometimes fun if you take chase instead of doing gens all game (fun meta) honestly sometime in the future a game like this or evolve should come out that sticks and listens to its community. Just wait for that honestly. Edit: VHS is the game to play instead absolutely better.
